archetypes.name: Favored Soul Sorc
archetypes.previewtext: An origin that grants divine powers and protection.

1.featuretextwithbullet: Divine Magic - You may choose spells and cantrips from the cleric spell list as well as he sorcerer's. You still cast them as sorcerer spells.
Supernatural Resilience - Gain 1 extra max HP per level up.
Favored By the Gods - Upon missing an attack or failing a saving throw, you may add 2d4 to the result in an attempt to pass. You may do this once per short or long rest.

6.featuretextwithbullet: Blessed Countenance - Pick one appearance change: beautiful, youthful, kind, or imposing. You now gain expertise in all Charisma checks you are proficient in.

14.featuretextwithbullet: Divine Purity - You gain immunity to disease, poison damage, and the poisoned condition.

18.featuretextwithbullet: Unearthly Recovery - If your current HP is below half of your maximum, you may use a bonus action to regain HP equal to half of your maximum. You may only use this feature once per long rest.
